<h3 class="card-title">Containerized Selenium API</h3>
<h6 class="card-subtitle text-muted">Running a Docker Container with Fast API, and requesting data using selenium</h6>
</div>
<div class="card-body">
<p class="card-text">The main objective of this repository is to deploy a Docker container with both, FastAPI and Selenium, to check the possibilities when we try to use FastAPI to receive parameters, and run a selenium process in the background to gather and parse data.</p>

<div class="card mb-3">
<div class="card-body">
<h3 class="card-title">Brazilian Elections Data - <em>In Portuguese</em></h3>
<h6 class="card-subtitle text-muted">2022 - 2nd term</h6>
</div>
<img src="/projects/screenshot_apuracao_eleicoes.png" class="contain"/>
<div class="card-body">
<p class="card-text">Shiny application to follow the voting counts for the Brazilian 2022 presidential elections in the second term. This application sources live data from the TSE (Superior Electoral Court of Brazil), allowing for the user to check in real time the voting count. The application includes data in the country level, state level and municipality level.</p>
<img src = "https://img.shields.io/github/stars/paeselhz/apuracao_eleicoes_2022?style=social">
<div class="card-body">
<a href="https://paese.shinyapps.io/apuracao_eleicoes_2022/" class="card-link">Live App</a>
<a href="https://github.com/paeselhz/apuracao_eleicoes_2022" class="card-link">GitHub</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<p class="card-text">The purpose of this application is to allow for exam applicants to understand how disputed will be the entrance to specific courses at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS).
